column5: Nice chrome!
nicely done bud.....Those vertical gill shots look weird with a steelhead though......Trips me out a bit. Used to seeing Smallies in your hand like that !!!!  Good job none the less !!!
Great stuff Steve!  The fishing looked hot that's for sure!
wow, those are beautiful fish, great job
thanks for the replies everyone. it wasa great day thats for sure.  Good luck to everyone thisweekend!  Beat em up, but leave somefor me when I get a chance to get back out!
nice fish steve...
thanks everyone

Hey all, I got out for a few hours this morning, and the rivers were packed!!  Managed to get some spots to ourselves on a couple of our favourite tribs and put a beating on them, best day out so far this season.  Gonna be busy these next few days!!  Good luck to everyone and be respectful to your neighbouring anglers, give everyone space, catch and release when possible.  P.S. Yes I do realize I am gill holding some fish.                Great day out!
Your finally using the pin!!! How do you like it man???
whats up Christian ... i love it dude!
That a boy!!!!   JENOOOO!!!!
Nice job!!
some hogs there!!!  good job fellas
Nice job!  I'm jealous...
that day was great fun me and my cousin are gona be down again tommorow by the way DONT PUT YOUR ROD AND REEL INTO THE MUD!!!! my dad would not feed me for 2 days if i did that LOL
Looks like a great day on the river, good job steve!
That shot was in the AM when it was all froze up ... much more careful in the afternoon, thats for sure
Told ya so!!!!!!   RF
Dude killer fish man! I am down your way in a week and a half, hope they are still biting!  great work, awesome pics!
Thanks man!  We gotta get out soon, I've got the bug
Nice Chromers! Solid fish and Solid Numbers! I need to get out for some steelies!
If you need a wingman let me know
Awesome lookin fish!!  -Ben
Saweeeet fish.  Great report.  Joey
Congrats on your outing...Quality fish...Quality pics  Top angling
congrats on the fish
BEAUTY FISH BRO
WTG Steve, some nice fish there!
Nice report Steve.  You've got the touch!
Very nice fish Steve.  Thanks for the report.
Nice looking fish...WTG guys!
